description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 28.7 (Foundation design and Piling Methods Statement) and Condition 28.8 (Piling or Penetrative Foundation Methods Statement) in relation to the basement works for Plot 12 within the Phase 1B (South) sub-phase and basement works for Plot 13 within the Phase 1C sub-phase; and the submission of details to partially discharge Condition 28.7 (Foundation Design and Piling Methods Statement) and Condition 28.8 (Piling or Penetrative Foundation Methods Statement) for the basement works to be undertaken for Plot 14 within the Phase 2 (South) sub-phase of planning Permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/2014 for the Comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area, North West London : South of the M1 Junction 1 / North Circular and to the East of Brent Terrace
